question: The 12th India Security Summit (ISS) was recently held in which city?
explanation: On 29th August 2019, the 12th India Security Summit (ISS) was held in New Delhi on the theme “Towards New National Cyber Security Strategy”.  During the conference, the various issues discussed such as protection of critical national infrastructure, emerging cyber threats: Incidents, Challenges and Response. The Government of India (GoI) has taken various measures to combat cyber threats. To combat cyber crime, the Union Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) has already rolled out a scheme ‘Indian Cyber Crime Coordination Centre (I4C)’ in the country.  Beside this, “Cyber Swachhta Kendra”  which is a part of the Government of India\'s Digital India initiative under the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) is also in force.
